item.title: Delinea Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Delinea Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsDecember 17, 2024Delinea, Inc.is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for vulnerabilities in Delinea products or services listed ondelinea.com, or vulnerabilities in third-party products or services discovered by or reported to Delinea, unless covered by the scope of another CNA. Read the Delinea news release: “Delinea Joins CVE Numbering Authority Program.”

item.title: Cepheid Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Cepheid Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsDecember 17, 2024Cepheidis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for Cepheid products.

item.title: S21sec Cyber Solutions by Thales Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: S21sec Cyber Solutions by Thales Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsDecember 17, 2024S21sec Cyber Solutions by Thalesis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for vulnerabilities discovered by S21sec that are not within another CNA’s scope.

item.title: Roche Diagnostics Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Roche Diagnostics Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsDecember 17, 2024Roche Diagnosticsis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for Roche’s medical technology products.

item.title: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on December 11 Now Available
item.description: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on December 11 Now AvailablenewsJanuary 7, 2025TheCVE Boardheld a teleconference meeting on December 11, 2024. Read themeeting minutes summary.

item.title: SOCRadar Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: SOCRadar Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsJanuary 7, 2025SOCRadar Cyber Intelligence Inc.is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for vulnerabilities in SOCRadar products and services and vulnerabilities discovered by or reported to SOCRadar that are not in another CNA’s scope.

item.title: PTC Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: PTC Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsJanuary 7, 2025PTC Inc.is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for all currently supported PTC software products and cloud/SaaS services.

item.title: VulnCon 2025Call for Papers Closes January 15
item.description: VulnCon 2025Call for Papers Closes January 15blogBy CVE Program|January 7, 2025TheCVE ProgramandFIRSTwill co-hostVulnCon 2025at the McKimmon Center in Raleigh, North Carolina, USA, on April 7-10, 2025. TheCall for Paperscloses on January 15, 2025. See detailshere.

item.title: CVE Program Expands Partnership with Thales Group
item.description: CVE Program Expands Partnership with Thales GroupblogBy CVE Program|January 7, 2025TheCVE® Programis expanding its partnership withThales Groupfor managing the assignment ofCVE Identifiers (CVE IDs)and publication ofCVE Recordsfor the CVE Program.

item.title: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 236 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for January 13, 2025
item.description: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 236 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for January 13, 2025blogBy CVE Program|January 14, 2025The “CNA Enrichment Recognition List” for January 13, 2025, is now available with 236 CNAs listed. Published every two weeks on the CVE website, the list recognizes thoseCVE Numbering Authorities (CNAs)that are actively providing enhanced vulnerability data in theirCVE Records. CNAs are added to the list if they provideCommon Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS)andCommon Weakness Enumeration (CWE™)information 98% of the time or more within the two-week period of their last published CVE Record.
